title: Problems with PBE
body:
Hey Guys,

I never been in this Forum but,
My Fricking PBE Account didnt worked. 

Well I started to rage after I Wrote my password about 50 Times till I finaly read
the Messagebox at the right side that my Account is currently Disabled??? But why?.

I own this PBE Account longer than 3-4 Years tho...
I appreciate any help I could get. {{summoner:3}} 


Yours faithfully,

Max

replies.body: I pulled up your account to see if I could find that PBE account for you, but it doesn't look like this one has ever had a pbe account. In order to look into what happened, it'd be best for you to hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). That way we can freely go over your information with you one on one!
